text: Hi Tony. I just heard about a past Escape Studios student of mine that has opened a new vfx company in Beijing and is hiring! Any interest for after graduating?

It’s something i would definitely consider! I ideally wanted to go Korea but I don’t mind good anywhere outside of The Uk for a year to take a break and work. Would they hire people in junior positions? And what company would that be ? Thanks a lot for the effort!
